title: Evelynn Splash Art in the Free Champion Rotation
body:
https://i.gyazo.com/85285d1a4938fd048bc538346be8253c.png

We've got Annie, Bard, Braum, Evelynn's boobs.... WAIT, EVELYNN'S BOOBS?

I'm assuming this happened because of her new splash art. Something you might want to fix...

replies.body: Thanks for the report! We're aware of this issue - lemme check on the status. ^-^
